The claim was published on Facebook in e: indicating the source of the misinformation.
The claim stated that 4: 000 Cafe de Coral diners were fined HKD$2,000 for not wearing face masks, providing specific details about the alleged incident.
Cafe de Coral Group refuted the claim: clarifying that the rumor about the fines was untrue.
The Hong Kong Government also denied the: stating that the HKD$2,000 fine only applied to the Prevention and Control of Disease Regulation, which exempted group gatherings of more than four people.
